author: jleroux
msg: The updateApprovedOrderItems defines the itemAttributesMap, itemEstimatedDeliveryDateMap and itemEstimatedShipDateMap IN parameters as optional. But if you use this service out of an event context then you cross NPEs
This is because in the context of an event the missing parameters are initialised as empty. This hid the issue so far because updateApprovedOrderItems is only used once, called by an event.

author: tilman
msg: PDFBOX-1915: created abstract shading resource type for common stuff to 4,5,6,7; more refactoring

author: gmazza
msg: Reduced comment days options to 3,7,14,30,60,90 & unlimited.

author: jleroux
msg: The updateApprovedOrderItems defines the itemAttributesMap, itemEstimatedDeliveryDateMap and itemEstimatedShipDateMap IN parameters as optional. But if you use this service (updateOrderItems) out of an event context then you cross NPEs. This is because in the context of an event the missing parameters are initialised as empty. This hid the issue so far because updateApprovedOrderItems is only used once, called by an event.

author: olegk
msg: HttpHost constructor with arbitrary hostname and inet address
